Question: This person also landed her first starring role in Crossroads, released in February 2002.
Hints: It reached number one in the US later in the month, giving this person her fifth number one on the chart.
The April 1999 cover of Rolling Stone featured this person lying on her bed, clad with a bra, shorts and an open top.
